sn36.18:4.1: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu … pe …
sn36.18:4.2: ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavā etadavoca:
sn36.18:4.3: “katamā nu kho, bhikkhave, vedanā, katamo vedanāsamudayo, katamo vedanānirodho, katamā vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā?
sn36.18:4.4: Ko vedanāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇan”ti?
sn36.18:4.7: sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
